description:
B-PROJECT starts gaining attention after their performance at the RAIZIN Festival. They begin getting more work, and the members becoming increasingly positive about working together as a ten-man unit. An article on major actor Matsukura Kenzo`s romantic scandal is printed in a magazine. Korekuni is troubled to see his father Matsukura be the subject of gossip. When a persistent paparazzi looking for more information on Matsukura comes to Korekuni, he recalls the time he spent at the training school Bambi.
Source: crunchyroll
